title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage) (No. 2) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister housing local government heritage) (no 2) order 2020

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Kevin Dillon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Kevin Dillon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage with effect from 26 October 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

8 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [612] 3
